title: "League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install League alpha client or try again."

replies.body:
This could be caused by a few things, but let's try a list of steps that have been working for others experiencing this error:

> * First, visit your League directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)
* Next, delete the **LeagueClient.exe** file
* Launch the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file
* [Initiate a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) of League's files

Let me know if this fixed it. ^.^
My client auto updated to the new client after I deleted the exe file and launched the admin. No need to repair.
Same here. Much thanks Targons :)
Targons I will gift you. You fixed my League Client{{item:3070}} Accept my friend request.
No need to gift me. Hearing your issue was resolved is a gift in itself! ~ヾ(＾∇＾)
No one ever gifted me and seeing you saying no to a gift makes me lose my mind buddy
Thank god!!! It worked literally tearing my hair out
OMFG DUDE I LOVE YOU {{summoner:14}}  {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} <3
Ur a wizard targons!

This fixed it for me, but it took three hours to reinstall the game. 

This issue was brought about when i clicked the "Download alpha client" option before even clicking launch for the client. It then did nothing. it didnt install the alpha client what so ever. The top bar never changed to the downloading bar. It just sat there. I figured I could just launch it then, I did, and got this error.
You are my Hero!Thanks.
Thanks you so much Targons, you solved my league problem :D. I'll never thank you enough. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

TYTYTYTYTYTYTYTYTYY
2H INTENTING THIS TY MADAFAKER
Now, if you could tell me how to get rid of that stupid "Bug Splat" thing that caused the whole problem, I'd be eternally grateful.

Never mind about the Bug Splat thing.  I did a search of the boards, found where you led to doing a game repair, and, voila, problem fixed.  Thank you very much, kind sir.  I will be forever in you debt.  :D
Bless you, my new friend!  I'm so thankful I could kiss you.  It literally took hours and hours to re-install, but this was SO worth it.

Hey, i have the same problem, did this, but when I launch it, it doesnt go past the logo. just sits there. Before i tried fixing all this my client would constantly bugsplat. Its been like this since 6.23 came out. Ive done full repairs and uninstalls and re-installs. Nothing is working.

Your League install is probably *really borked*, then. I'd recommend reinstalling using [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) but ensure you run the installation file as admin (right-click, run as admin) and Launch League as admin after the installation (same steps as before).

I hope that helps!
Thx for the help but in the middle of the repair a pop up appears saying that  repair failed
I don't completely know what to do

> [{quoted}](name=Horrid,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=6oWtjAqK,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-11-23T17:12:39.400+0000)
>
> What is this bs, seriously..
>How long is this going to take want to play
Thanks this worked!{{champion:131}}
YES THANK YOU NOW I CAN FEED AGAIN!
So Im trying to do this same thing and when i search my league directory it sends me to a page that says %28c's this site coud not be reached....
I don't understand what is going on but I have reinstalled it about 10 times can you help me please
i have this problem so i did what it said and re installed it an still have the problem

I was having the same issue here but now since i deleted the LeagueClient im getting the old issue that i have not reported ever since  6.23 ive always got Unspecified Error Please Check Logs for more info, due to update faliure ive searched and read multiple fixes for this ex: (deleting the projects file under RADS) multiple re-installs and repairs wat  do i do is it my OS.... 32 bit Windows 7 ultimate?? please help and why always stuck at 33% or 99% going nutz!!
